title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker forms an underground fight club that evolves into something far more dangerous.

title: American Psycho
description: A wealthy investment banker hides his psychopathic alter ego while navigating 1980s Manhattan.

title: Dexter
description: A forensic expert leads a double life as a vigilante serial killer targeting criminals who escape justice.

title: Drive
description: A quiet stuntman with a criminal past gets involved in a dangerous heist to protect his neighbor.

title: Fury
description: A tank commander leads his crew on a deadly mission behind enemy lines during World War II.

title: Goodfellas
description: The story of Henry Hill and his rise and fall in the Italian-American mafia.

title: La Haine
description: Three young men struggle with violence and police brutality in the suburbs of Paris.

title: La La Land
description: An aspiring actress and a jazz musician fall in love while chasing their dreams in Los Angeles.

title: Nightcrawler
description: A driven man discovers the dangerous world of freelance crime journalism in Los Angeles.

title: No Country for Old Men
description: A hunter finds drug money and becomes hunted by a relentless killer.

title: Taxi Driver
description: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
description: The rise and fall of a stockbroker living a life of excess in New York City.
